Jorge, Gaussian basis sets of triple and quadruple zeta valence quality for correlated wave functions, Mol. Phys. 104, 2945 (2006). K Ca Sc Ti V Cr Mn Fe Co Ni Cu Zn Ga Ge As Se Br Kr: S. F. Rb Y Zr Nb Mo Tc Ru Rh Pd Ag Cd In Sn Sb Te I Xe: C. T. Campos and F. E.
